text: St. Peter's Umbrella (Hungarian: Szent Péter esernyője, Slovakian: dáždnik svätého Petra) is a 1958 Hungarian Slovakian drama movie directed by Frigyes Bán and Vladislav Pavlovič. It stars Mari Törőcsik, Sándor Pécsi, Karol Machata, János Rajz, István Egri, Gábor Mádi Szabó, Zsuzsa Csala and was the third adaption of the 1895 novel of the same name by Kálmán Mikszáth. ==Other websites== * Category:1958 drama movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:Slovakian movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Frigyes Bán
title: St. Peter's Umbrella (1958 movie)
